item.description:
Join us this Friday evening to experience the taste of authentic Caribbean & Latin American cuisine. But, do not forget to bring your dancing shoes... After dinner, enjoy the sounds and rhythm of Latin music. Grab your partner and get on the dance floor to do the Merenge, Salsa or Bachata. Follow that with more dancing to top 40 music.

Directions:

From I-91, take Exit 27 (Brainard Rd./Airport Rd.)
Turn onto Airport Rd.
Follow Airport Rd. to intersection with Wethersfield Ave.
Turn left onto Wethersfield Ave.
La Casona will be immediately on your right.
item.how_to_find_us: Sam will be waiting for you in the bar area.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Latin Night : Dinner and Dance...
